panels.title: 耗时区间分布(右上角所选时间区间)

targets.expr: sum(increase(rpc_server_handled_total{app=~"$app",env=~"$env", code_type="success"}[$__range])) by (callee_service, callee_method, caller_service) /  sum(increase(rpc_server_handled_total{app=~"$app",env=~"$env"}[$__range])) by (callee_service, callee_method, caller_service)

sum(increase(rpc_server_handled_msec_sum{app=~"$app",env=~"$env"}[$__range])) by (callee_service, callee_method, caller_service) / sum(increase(rpc_server_handled_msec_count{app=~"$app",env=~"$env"}[$__range])) by  (callee_service, callee_method, caller_service)
topk(20, histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rpc_server_handled_msec_bucket{app=~"$app",env=~"$env"}[$__range])) by (le, callee_service, callee_method, caller_service)))

sum(increase(rpc_client_handled_total{app=~"$app", env=~"$env", code_type!="success"}[1m])) by (callee_service, callee_method)/ sum(increase(rpc_client_handled_total{app=~"$app", env=~"$env"}[1m])) by (callee_service, callee_method)

panels.title: 耗时区间分布(右上角所选时间区间)

targets.expr: sum(increase(rpc_client_handled_total{app=~"$app",env=~"$env", code_type="success"}[$__range])) by (callee_service, callee_method, caller_service, caller_method) /  sum(increase(rpc_client_handled_total{app=~"$app",env=~"$env"}[$__range])) by (callee_service, callee_method, caller_service, caller_method)

sum(increase(rpc_client_handled_msec_sum{app=~"$app",env=~"$env"}[$__range])) by (caller_service, caller_method, callee_service, callee_method) / sum(increase(rpc_client_handled_msec_count{app=~"$app",env=~"$env"}[$__range])) by  (caller_service, caller_method, callee_service, callee_method)
topk(20, histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rpc_client_handled_msec_bucket{app=~"$app",env=~"$env"}[$__range])) by (le, callee_service, callee_method, caller_service, caller_method)))
